ygData.subject: Hunting
ygData.msgSnippet: Quickstrike: Huddled in a snow den, Quickstrike rested in beast mode, easing his dizziness with closed eyes. He forced his body more and more to work

Quickstrike:




Huddled in a snow den, Quickstrike rested in beast mode, easing his 
dizziness with closed eyes. He forced his body more and more to work 
correctly. His core temperature slowly at a low temperture began to 
set. 

He opened his eyes to a shift in the snow, and a scent hitting his 
olfactory sensors. A wolf. He jerked his head up and a vicious hiss 
errupted from his cobra tail. A growl returned.

Who ever this wolf was, if he stayed down his den he would be 
trapped. He eyed up the opening of the den, shifted his long body, 
and lunged his tail forward, snapping at the wolf.

The wolf snarled and jumped back. But it came back to the entrance 
and began digging.  After that, Quickstrike jumped out of the den, at 
the wolf. He jumped onto it, arching his tail for hit on the wolf. 
The wolf yelped in surprised and threw him off. Quickstrike went 
sliding across the snow, banging his lower mandable on the ice and 
snow. He jumped up to face the mischievous wolf.

It was Rowdy Wolf. The dire wolf rebalanced himself, shifting his big 
body, eyeing him down.

"Rowdy?"

Rowdy Wolf gave no friendly greeting in return to the reconition, 
instead he pounced at the Fuzor. He leaped out of the way, and 
transformed to robot mode once hitting the ground with his feet. 
Rowdy Wolf had no means of a reunion. The wolf transformed to robot 
mode in return, withdrawing his reaper.

"You're coming with me," he said. "We're taking you back?"

"Who? What?" He had no idea what he was talking about, and had no 
clue of his convertion to the Vok. Rowdy Wolf lunged at him, slashing 
down his reaper. Quickstrike stumbled back, grabbing onto the weapon 
before he could go deep into his chest. He twisted his body around, 
trying to throw the bot off. Rowdy Wolf pushed back, throwing the 
little bot on his back.

Rowdy Wolf bent over and grabbed him by the neck. He held him up to 
his face.

"We lost you and now you are alive." Rowdy Wolf said. "The Vok have 
plans for you."

It spooked him. He knew the Vok were nothing but bad news. He kicked, 
and then raised his arm out to Rowdy Wolf's chest, and fired.

Rowdy Wolf yelp and dropped him.

Quickstrike stood up. "Ah don't know what yer talkin' about Rowdy, 
but ah aint' doin' nothin' fer them Vok."

Rowdy Wolf stood back up. A face to face fight errupted between them. 
Quickstrike defended his life, firing and using his fangs, while 
Rowdy Wolf fought back, but struggled to grab him. Quickstrike kept 
in movement, leaping at Rowdy Wolf at certain times. He managed to 
grab into him, and began to tear at his external armor, using his 
fangs like hooks. He pulled back hard until something broke off. He 
dropped to the ground, with Rowdy Wolf roaring in pain. 

Quickstrike bolted to a cluster of boulder for protection. Rowdy Wolf 
chased after him, slashing his reaper to stop him. He leaped it, and 
stepped on the neck of it. He kicked Rowdy Wolf in the face, sending 
him stumbling backwards. Quickstrike grabbed the reaper in his so-
called hands and eyed Rowdy Wolf down. He lunged to, slashing down on 
him. He slashed over and over, hitting his knees, face and chest.

On the last hit, Rowdy Wolf lunged out at the little Fuzor, knocking 
him to the ground, but Quickstrike jabbed the blade into his chest. 
He flipped him off with as much power as he could get from his arms. 
He felt a vibration through the body of the reaper and felt a slight 
electronic pulse. The blade hit Rowdy Wolf's spark. He exposed it 
from ripping his chest plate.

Quickstrike kept still, waiting for another attack, but nothing 
happened. He killed Rowdy Wolf.
